title: Life-threatening flash flooding hits southeast Queensland | 7NEWS
description: Ex-tropical cyclone Koji is causing life-threatening flash flooding across southeast Queensland, with some areas forecast to receive up to 300 millimetres of rainfall. The severe weather system is pushing moisture southward, causing rivers to swell dangerously. The wet weather is expected to clear from Wednesday. title: Victoria bushfire crisis claims first life | 7NEWS
description: Victoria is experiencing a devastating bushfire crisis with one confirmed fatality found near the Longwood Fire. At least 300 homes and businesses have been destroyed across the state, with active fire fronts burning in Otways National Park, Longwood, Ravenswood, Nattermuck and Wawa. Firefighters are utilising cooler conditions before weather conditions worsen later in the week. title: Deadly bushfires and flooding crisis grip Australia | 7NEWS
description: Victoria faces a deadly bushfire crisis with one confirmed fatality and at least 300 homes and businesses destroyed across multiple fire fronts including Longwood, Ravenswood, and the Otways National Park. Queensland's southeast braces for life-threatening flash flooding with up to 300 millimetres of rain expected as ex-tropical cyclone Koji pushes south. The New South Wales government introduces new laws targeting unauthorised prayer halls and hate preachers, requiring councils to consult with police before approving new places of worship. title: NSW cracks down on hate preachers and unauthorised prayer halls | 7NEWS
description: The New South Wales government has introduced new laws targeting hate preachers and unauthorised prayer halls operating without planning approval. Councils will be required to consult with police about community safety before approving new places of worship. These measures were introduced following the Bondi terror attack as part of broader efforts to combat hate. title: Meta purges 540,000 accounts under Australia's youth ban | 7NEWS
description: Meta has removed 330,000 Instagram accounts, 170,000 Facebook profiles, and 40,000 Threads accounts in the first month since Australia's world-first social media ban for under-16s took effect. The social media giant has expressed concerns about the ban's effectiveness in increasing safety and worries about vulnerable teens being blocked from online support groups. Meta is calling for age verification to occur at app store level, while facing potential fines of nearly $50 million for non-compliance, as some young users continue to bypass the restrictions through VPNs and other methods. title: Human remains found as bushfires turn deadly
description: The bushfire emergency in Victoria has turned deadly with a body found in an area ravaged by the Longwood blaze. Police confirmed human remains had been found in the central Victorian region after officers were able to access an area that had been cut off by fires. #bushfire #fire #victoria #longwood #firefighters

title: Flash flooding predicted for Queensland
description: Queenslanders are being warned to brace for life-threatening flash flooding with up to 300mm of rain forecast as ex-tropical cyclone Koji pushes south. #cyclone #cyclonekoji #flood #flashflood #queensland

title: Explosion causes fire in Sydney's southwest
description: A man has been arrested after a fire broke out following an explosion in Rossmore, southwest of Sydney. #fire #explosion #firefighter #westernsydney #sydney

title: Widespread protests over ICE shooting
description: Thousands of people across America have marched in protest against the shooting of 37-year-old woman Renee Good by an ICE agent in Minneapolis. #ice #minneapolis #protest #usa #us

title: 'You should take him at his word': Former CIA agent on Trump's Iran strategy | 7NEWS
description: Protests have spread to all 31 provinces in Iran for the first time, representing the broadest demonstration of dissent against the regime in the country's history. Former CIA agent Mike Baker explains why this movement differs from previous uprisings and says the Pentagon is preparing military target packages as the Trump administration considers response options. description: A 29-year-old detainee has been charged with murder following the fatal stabbing of another man inside Sydneyâ€™s Villawood Detention Centre. #crime #villawood #sydney #nswpolice #detentioncentre

title: 'They're on the move': A crocodile warning for the wet season in Australia | 7NEWS
description: David McMahon from Venture North Australia says large saltwater crocodiles are increasingly appearing in populated areas across northern Australia during the current wet season due to above-average rainfall. The flooding has caused crocodiles to move into new territories across Far North Queensland, the Northern Territory, and northern Western Australia, making previously safe swimming spots dangerous. title: Man arrested over explosion and fire at Rossmore, Sydney
description: A man has been arrested after an explosion sparked a fire that ripped through a shed at Rossmore in Sydney's southwest. #fire #explosion #rossmore #sydney #nswpolice

title: 'We will not accept this type of hatred': NSW cracks down on illegal prayer halls | 7NEWS
description: NSW Premier Chris Minns and Police Minister Yasmin Catley announce legislation to increase penalties tenfold for illegally operating prayer halls. The government will grant councils enhanced powers to shut down unauthorised religious venues and disconnect utilities, specifically targeting venues allegedly used to preach hate speech. The Premier frames the changes as part of a broader crackdown on hate speech in NSW, with additional measures planned over the next 6 to 12 months.
